bibl.title: A Latin Private Document on Papyrus (ChLA XLIV 1300 recto).
bibl.note: 1. Private document (P. Vindob. Lat. Inv. 74 recto = Ch.L.A. XLIV 1300 recto descr.). Arsinoites or Herakleopolites?, late II AD. - 2. A contract of παραθήκη? - 3. Dotal settlements? - 4. A testament? - Appendix [on l. 11].
bibl.seg: Giulio Iovine, A Latin Private Document on Papyrus (ChLA XLIV 1300 recto).

1. Private document (P. Vindob. Lat. Inv. 74 recto = Ch.L.A. XLIV 1300 recto descr.). Arsinoites or Herakleopolites?, late II AD. - 2. A contract of παραθήκη? - 3. Dotal settlements? - 4. A testament? - Appendix [on l. 11].
